entries.s_144: Specifically, you will need to be aware of the sentry droids, and any creatures that might have escaped from their cages.
entries.s_146: Can you tell me more about the escaped creatures?
entries.s_148: These creatures have been modified to become very powerful. When the earthquake hit, our containment system went down, and now they are able to leave their cages and roam the halls. That is about all I know.
entries.s_150: Can you tell me more about the sentry droids?
entries.s_152: With our security system down, the droids' targeting protocol will be offline. They are likely to shoot at anything and everything that moves. They are positioned in halls throughout the complex.

entries.s_369: I'm sorry. What seems to be going on here?
entries.s_371: The security in our facility here has suffered a catastrophic failure. We're doing our best to get it under control.
entries.s_373: What of those creatures you mentioned earlier?
entries.s_375: Many of the experiments in this compound revolve around genetically mutating certain creatures. The earthquake that we experienced recently seems to have shut down out containment systems.
entries.s_377: Do you need a hand in getting it under control?
entries.s_379: Actually, I could use some help, but if you're going further into the compound, you'll need a code to get through that security door. Punch in the code 12872 and you can get through. There are some things you should watch out for though.

entries.s_738: Actually, I could use some help, but if you're going further into the compound, you'll need a code to get through that security door. Punch in the code 12872 and you can get through. There are some things you should watch out for though.
entries.s_7397bf4e: Remember, I don't recommend it. But if you want to get through the security door, punch in the code 12872.
entries.s_740: What kind of things do I need to watch out for?
entries.s_742: Specifically, you will need to be aware of the sentry droids, and any creatures that might have escaped from their cages.
entries.s_744: Can you tell me more about the escaped creatures?
entries.s_746: These creatures have been modified to become very powerful. When the earthquake hit, our containment system went down, and now they are able to leave their cages and roam the halls. That is about all I know.
entries.s_748: Can you tell me more about the sentry droids?
entries.s_75: With our security system down, the droids' targeting protocol will be offline. They are likely to shoot at anything and everything that moves. They are positioned in halls throughout the complex.
entries.s_750: With our security system down, the droids' targeting protocol will be offline. They are likely to shoot at anything and everything that moves. They are positioned in halls throughout the complex.
entries.s_752: OK. What would you like for me to do?
entries.s_754: The first thing that we need to do is to kill any of those mutant creatures that might have escaped. Then we'll have a good chance of getting this place back under control.
entries.s_758: No, I'm going to stay here and try to get the security system back online. Just go and help the others. I'm sure they're in trouble.
entries.s_762: Best of luck to you, friend. And be careful.
